title: Stage Lv3-P1-S04
description: Level 3 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The meeting had already finished when he arrived. (variant 1)
I had bought tickets before the movie started. (variant 1)
learning_points: Level 3 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 그가 도착했을 때 이미 회의가 끝나 있었습니다. (확장 1)
sentences.en: The meeting had already finished when he arrived. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 영화가 시작하기 전에 표를 샀어요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: I had bought tickets before the movie started. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 그들은 전에 그곳에 가본 적이 없었습니다. (확장 1)
sentences.en: They had never been there before. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 숙제를 다 했을 때 친구가 전화했어요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: My friend called when I had finished homework. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 그녀는 이미 저녁을 먹었다고 했습니다. (확장 1)
sentences.en: She said she had already had dinner. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 비가 그치고 나서 밖에 나갔어요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: I went out after the rain had stopped. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 10시까지 모든 일을 마쳤습니다. (확장 1)
sentences.en: I had completed everything by 10 o'clock. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 그 책을 읽어본 적이 있었나요? (확장 1)
sentences.en: Had you read that book before? (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 우리가 도착했을 때 그들은 이미 떠났어요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: They had already left when we arrived. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 그는 전에 그런 경험을 해본 적이 없었습니다. (확장 1)
sentences.en: He had never experienced that before. (variant 1)
